promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young epic horse grass-type pokemon wearing a regal crown. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or horse. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regaraffe, a a chibi young epic horse grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Bubble Launch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "horse", "grass" or "Regaraffe". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, horse-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Regaraffe, the Forest Foal Pokémon, frolics among the trees. Its Bubble Launch ability creates a playful yet powerful way to water nearby plants.
